```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

folder <- "./ncw_data/raw_data/CHAT/Life Expectancy/" 

# get filenames
files <- tibble(filename = list.files(folder))

# make a list of filepaths
filepath_list <-
  files %>%
  mutate(
    filepaths = paste0(folder,filename)
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    filename = NULL
  ) 

# create an empty list to store data frames
data_list <- list()

# read and store data from all files 
for (filepath in filepath_list$filepaths) { 
  data <- 
    read.csv(
      filepath, skip = 3, 
    ) %>%
    filter(
      !is.na(Geography) & Geography != "" # filter out extra rows
    ) %>%
    rename(
      Location = Geography,
      Value = Rate, # Years
      LowerCI = Lower.CI,
      UpperCI = Upper.CI
    ) %>%
    mutate(
      Indicator = "life_expectancy",
      Location = gsub("State Total", "WA", Location)
    ) %>%
    select(
      Location,
      Year,
      Value,
      LowerCI,
      UpperCI,
      Indicator
    )
  data_list <- append(data_list, list(data))
}

combined_data <- bind_rows(data_list)

write_csv(combined_data, "./ncw_data/cleaned_data/lifeexp_data.csv")
```
